text: Kevin Gerald Meyer (born May 9, 1956) is an American politician and businessman. He was the Lieutenant Governor of Alaska from 2018 to 2022. He was a Republican member of the Alaska Senate from January 20, 2009 to December 3, 2018. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Lieutenant Governors of Alaska Category:Politicians from Nebraska Category:Businesspeople from Nebraska Category:Businesspeople from Anchorage, Alaska Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Politicians from Anchorage, Alaska
title: Kevin Meyer (politician)
